oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Letters Have No Arms - Ernest Tubb performance ; Foolish Tears - Dick Thomas performance
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Performance of Letters Have No Arms, written by Ernest Tubb and Arbie Gibson, and performed by Ernest Tubb. Performance of Foolish Tears, written by Jenny Lou Carson, and performed by Dick Thomas. Both are Possibly a live radio performances.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Ernest Tubb; Texas Troubadours; Dick Thomas
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (0:00) Ernest Tubb performs "Letters Have No Arms" [incomplete] / (1:15) Ernest Tubb mentions the song title [incomplete] / (1:18) Dick Thomas performs "Foolish Tears" [incomplete]
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Tubb, Ernest, 1914-1984; Carson, Jenny Lou; Thomas, Dick
